body:
Hi,


I'm interested too. All packages we work on are in Python and most of them
wrapping up Radiance features.
I usually use in code subprocess, but for some things we write our own code
in Python.


For our radiance-based tool you can look on
http://deluminaelab.com/en/tools.html


Maybe discussion should be moved to Radiance-developement list?


Marija
___
